name: py-fastapi

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependencies.name: py-email-validator
dependencies.description: A robust email address syntax and deliverability validation library.

dependencies.name: py-httpx
dependencies.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependencies.name: py-itsdangerous
dependencies.description: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-orjson
dependencies.description:
Fast, correct Python JSON library supporting dataclasses, datetimes, and
numpy.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-python-multipart
dependencies.description: A streaming multipart parser for Python

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-starlette
dependencies.description: The little ASGI library that shines.

dependencies.name: py-ujson
dependencies.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.

dependent_to.name: py-gradio
dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models
